text.div:
Tumor Grade

Codes to indicate the grade of a tumor.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ncit.owl where concept descends from NCIT:C28076

name: TumorGrade
title: Tumor Grade
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: Codes to indicate the grade of a tumor.
